item.title: ‘Game of Thrones’ Actor Pilou Asbæk Joins Benedict Cumberbatch in Cary Fukunaga’s ‘Blood on Snow’ (Exclusive)
item.description: Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Eva Green also star in the feature adaptation of Jo Nesbo’s book.
